about_the_game:
Help run Pinecreek Hills and Puerto Rico's Tropical Rainforest Parks

Help Park Rangers run Pinecreek Hills and Puerto Rico’s Tropical Rainforest National parks. Have fun organizing Summer Season events on Bluewaters Lake, Cherokee River & Apache Nature trails.

Learn about Wildlife. Camp & Picnic beside Rivers and Bayous. Explore Silver Eagle Pueblo, atmospheric Waterfalls, Gorges, enchanted Caves and beautiful outdoor locations. Have fun hiking, biking and riding Pinecreek’s new Rail-Bike Trail.

Fly with Rangers through the Bermuda Triangle to San Juan in Puerto Rico. Visit the amazing El Yunque National park, the only tropical rainforest in the US. Explore the wondrous Caribbean seabed in a mini submarine. Help Vets on world famous Cayo Santiago - Monkey Island.

Present Springfield’s Community & Good Neighbor awards. Have Campfires & BBQ’s. Spot Bears, Deer and Eagles. Play great Hogs & Puzzles, Spot 100’s of Animals, Birds, Fish and Wildlife. Protect the environment, get Souvenirs and Awards along the way
